alert.note: Alert for Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; Marin Coastal Range; North Bay Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 23 at 8:17PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Marin and southeastern Sonoma Counties through 845 PM PST... At 817 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Point Reyes Station, or 14 miles west of Novato, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Petaluma, Novato, Point Reyes Station and Inverness. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; Marin Coastal Range; North Bay Interior Valleys
